name: Float label
tagline: Floating label for input elements. When input empty the label is placeholder.
body:
### Float Label
A jQuery plugin that creates floating labels in input elements.
Float Label allows you to quickly create labels that show more details about input element for use in web applications and websites. The Float Label is easily customizable by changing the less styles and provides flexibility with options.

### Features
* Straightforward implementation with simple options
* Can run on as many input elements as needed
* Input elements can have small icon on right or left side
* Floated labels look and feel is easily customized through the small less file

### Supported input types
* text
* password
* number
* tel
* email
* search
* url
